name: Space Moth DX (Demo)
description:
Space Moth DX (Demo)

Space Moth DX is the definitive edition of 1CC Games' intense arcade shoot 'em up, with a brand new DX Mode that will put even veteran bullet dodging skills to the test!

Beginners are catered for as well, with a rebalanced Arcade Mode that's just right for anyone looking to get started with bullet hell games.

This demo features the first 2 stages of the full game, in both DX Mode and Arcade Mode, with full controller and arcade stick support.

If you enjoy the Space Moth DX Demo, you can buy the full game on Steam!

Be sure to check our Itch page for more great games!
